scripts.install:all: concurrently "cd HostApp && npm install" "cd mf-personal-login && npm install" "cd login-company && npm install" "cd mf-personal-dashboard && npm install" "cd dashboard-company && npm install" "cd mf-marketing && npm install"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "cd HostApp && npm start" "cd mf-personal-login && npm start" "cd login-company && npm start" "cd mf-personal-dashboard && npm start" "cd dashboard-company && npm start" "cd mf-marketing && npm start"
